events.name: ProductAdded
events.description: Captures the event when a new product is added to the inventory.

events.name: SupplierAdded
events.description: Records the addition of a new supplier for sourcing products.

events.name: OrderPlaced
events.description: Indicates that an order has been placed for products.

events.name: InventoryChecked
events.description: Captures the event where inventory levels are checked before placing an order.

events.name: OrderShipped
events.description: Indicates that an order has been shipped to the customer.

commands.name: AddProduct
commands.description: Captures the event when a new product is added to the inventory.

commands.name: AddSupplier
commands.description: Records the addition of a new supplier for sourcing products.

commands.name: PlaceOrder
commands.description: Indicates that an order has been placed for products.

commands.name: CheckInventory
commands.description: Captures the event where inventory levels are checked before placing an order.

commands.name: ShipOrder
commands.description: Indicates that an order has been shipped to the customer.

integrationPoints.name: InventoryManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration point for managing product levels and stock.

integrationPoints.name: SupplierManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration for managing supplier information and performance.

integrationPoints.name: OrderProcessing
integrationPoints.description: Integration needed for processing orders after placement.

integrationPoints.name: ShippingManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration for managing logistics and shipments.
